title: CandyMachine
description: A Java Swing candy machine UI demo made for a school project.

title: ClockJS
description: A JavaScript canvas based real time customizable clock drawing program I made for a school art project. (including a version based on Pink Floyd's 'Time')

title: CannibalFish
description: A Unity prototype clone of the famous 'Ugh' game in which you need to eat other fishes in order to survive.

title: Ludum Dare 32
description: LD32 is the first game development contest I entered. The objective of this contentest was to make a game in 24 hours based on the theme "An Unconventional Weapon ". I made a side scrolling adventure game in which you have a mysterious pizza blasting gun named Project Pizza.

title: grammatical-gender-trainer
description: An iOS app used for studying grammatical genders (such as der, die and das in German). Uses the API of wrts, a Dutch word studying site, to import word lists.

title: PeasantWars
description: A top down shooter prototype written in Java

title: get-out
description: A top down shooter written in Swift using SpriteKit

title: supercalc
description: A simple iOS calculator app written in Swift as an exercise of Stanford's iTunes U course on iOS development.

title: TicTacoToeJS
description: A web version of my TicTacoToe game written in JavaScript/jQuery. Includes lots of animations

title: Buttonmasher
description: A web based mastermind style code cracking game in which you need to find the SHA-512 encrypted code by bruteforce/guessing it.

title: TicTacoToe-swift
description: An iOS version of my TicTacoToe game written in Swift

title: Ultimedia
description: Ultimedia is a static news site I made for a school project

title: swift-canvas
description: A small drawing program written in Swift playgrounds that uses emoji to render simple geometric drawings.

title: PirateGame
description: A super simple pirate styled iOS game written in Objective-C.

title: TicTacoToe
description: This is my oldest project on GitHub, and thus the first project I made using a source control system. It's a console based Tic Tac Toe game written in Java.
